runs.comm: an anticlimax if there ever was one, Lee spears down leg and the left-hander whooshes round gamely, a touch too late, and Gilchrist tidies up
straighter one, good length, driven back to the bowler
it was a fraction short, down leg, Gilchrist helping out with the commentary there, practising for a new media career
outside off, a touch short, and creamily driven on the front foot through the gap between point and extra cover who set off in vain pursuit. Neat timing and neater placement
Sehwag's first ball is a dot, up there just outside off and he drives off his toes square to point where the shaven Clarke picks up the ball without a fuss
a very similar ball and another dot results as Captain Clarke tidies up once more

Sehwag's run-out at the non-striker's end, dropping down his hands, Clarke stopping the ball well at point with a dive to the left and a direct hit shudders down the stumps. Sehwag crashes his bat into the ground as he walks off, furious
pushed across the left hander, deliberately, who leaves it well alone
a push to backward point for a quick single
plenty of room outside off and the ball is crashed over mid-off
top shot there, too full on leg, and Gambhir merely turns his wrists on that one, flicking it away tennis-like through fine leg
and now a soft dismissal, the ball landing outside off and Gambhir hardly gets any bat on a tame would-be-lofted drive to mid-off where Hopes takes an easy catch
pushed across the right hander, who defends to backward point off the back foot
slower delivery across the right hander, who waits and guides it with good control out to third man
short, outside off, the ball's left alone with some shouldered arms
short ball that came through at under 150, the batsman doing well to sway back on one knee as the ball was coming straight at him
good pace again, a sharp and straight one rapping him on the hands as it climbed from short

outside off and if you're going to chop, chop hard as the saying doesn't go, the batsman shaping to cut off the back foot and the top edge flies hard and high to bounce once before the rope behind the keeper
outside off, a touch short, and driven well down the ground, straight and David Hussey chases that one down
booming low full toss, Karthik plays all around it and he just didn't see it, the ball skittles the sticks
right up there on off, and defended well on the front foot
slower ball, a touch of loop in at the right hander who waits for the ball to cross him and then drives uppishly to mid-off where David Hussey gets on the international scoresheet for the first time
slower delivery again, Dhoni lets that one past him and the ball's tidied up by Gilchrist
rolls his fingers over a would-be incutter, tightens up the batsman on off and it's defended forward
plants it on a good length again and all the batsman can do is defend
plants his front foot down the track, thinks about cover-driving as the ball leaps over the bat which he tucks behind the pad at the last
up there on off, defended on the front foot
bangs a bouncer down off and Sharma's off the mark in streaky fashion, surprised by the lift and somehow pokes it down past first slip, through the vacant second in fact
boomed up there on off and defended on the front foot this time
straighter bouncer, but still down the off channel, and a shuffle of a back foot cut goes up in the air
short ball through off again, left alone this time
slower full toss, driven out straight past the bowler, the two mid- fielders meeting in the middle to tidy up inside the rope
starts tidily enough, a drive to mid-off
a shortish one, straight, and boomed off the back foot with a bit of a golf swing along the ground, Bracken tidying up well at mid-on
short ball, hooked off the nose through a very fine, fine leg
short ball again, played down off the back foot
bends one in on off, driven out to short midwicket, dabbed down
outside off, the batsman rocks onto the back foot and caresses the short ball through the gully to ease a single
on off, shortish, worked back down off the back foot
nipped back in from outside off, the batsman walks back, exposes his stumps but connects well with a back-foot cut
on leg, turned round behind square for an easy single
Hopes strikes with his fourth ball! The ball comes in on a good length on off, Sharma shapes to swivel a pull round, misses, and his off stump is clipped
banged in short outside off, doesn't really lift off the surface, and eased through the covers
stays over, pushed across the left hander, who rises on to the balls of his feet and pushes into the covers
outside off, short one rising through to the keeper
slower delivery, driven out straight to mid-off for a quick single
eased on the front foot, defended forward
right up there, straight, defended forward
on a good length, defended on the front foot
that one at 128kph, on off, and driven out to mid-off for an easy single
Up there and defended on the front foot.
finds the gap square of the wicket
outside off, driven to the covers
slower delivery, 110kph, up there on off and defended on the front foot
a touch quicker, outside off, and driven into the covers now
nipped in from off, defended down off the back foot
starts well with one outside off, driven into the covers, Symonds returns withan underarm shy but he's too late
back over the wicket now, a touch full outside off, driven to the covers
outside off, tucked on the front foot behind point
round the wicket, up there on the toes on off, pushed on the front foot towards mid-on
slides one through outside off, an appeal for a stumping, but the foot was well grounded, no need for a replay
on the front foot, pushes forward defensively at a good-length delivery
tightens him up outside off, the ball veering back in, but he does well to make room to drive forward to mid-off
on leg, tucked well off the legs to midwicket
on off, tries to work that one out to short midwicket, the bottom hand coming up off the bat, no run, Symonds tries to run him out
outside off, Dhoni ever so nearly chops on to his stumps, the ball deflecting down off the inside edge and in front of, then wide of, leg stump
up there on leg, a neat flick off the legs behind square
pushed out to point off the back foot
on off, turned off the legs towards midwicket
definite wide down leg
swirls one in on off, the ball arcing out, Dhoni flashes hard at it
up there on off, the batsman waits, presents a very straight bat towards cover
swivels in on middle, a touch short, and that's Hussey's first wicket as Dhoni stands tall and swats a pull to deep midwicket which doesn't quite have the legs
up there on off and defended on the front foot
outside off, flapped into the ground, the batsman not at all getting hold of a drive to mid-off
outside off, worked down to third man
a touch of turn, the ball not really coming on to the bat, worked out to the covers
outside off, enough room to drive hard through cover
on leg, turned round to short midwicket, quietly, and the batsmen run through
right up there, driven forward, back to the bowler, without much power
driven out, again without much power, to mid-off
down leg, swept round well to backward square
brisked off the toes to the covers, and they run the second well
round the wicket, played back towards the covers
stabbed down off the back foot through to deep third man
worked out to mid-on this time
flayed to midwicket but didn't quite pick the gap nor the full face of the bat, and it's tidied up easily
outside off, plenty of room, driven hard but aerially to a wideish long-off
starts with a bouncer, played down off the back foot and they shuffle through a quick single
waits for one on off, and defends back down on the front foot
on leg, played down to short mid-on where Harbhajan would have been well out with a direct hit from Michael Hussey
outside off, driven to the covers
down leg, short ball, Harbhajan plays for the rise that doesn't come, he was shaping to pull uppishly, but the ball inside cannoned into his bottom edge and back down onto the pitch
outside off, crashed the ball to long-on, not the most attractive shot but brought up a single
swivelled in to the middle stump and a magnificent catch from Clarke, who's fielding has been excellent from the off, removes the batsman with a diving effort

steps down the track, outside off, to meet the ball that doesn't quite come on to the bat, shapes to drive over cover, takes a slight edge, spoons to gully and that's another terrific catch, scooped low
ooh, Ishant nearly found one of the many close in on the off, the ball just bouncing in front of gully
worked out towards short midwicket
outside off, driven forward with hardly any power, more of a defensive push in fact
width outside off, driven aerially towrads deep cover, where Hodge tidies up just inside the rope
off the mark with an edgy single, Ishant not getting over the ball, leaning back and popping one up, but safe, through the covers
on leg, turned well off the toes behind square for a safe two
right up there on off, and defended into the ground
doesn't control that one, standing back and offering the bat towards the gully
outside off, driven out to mid-off, a straight shot
nipped back from outside off, worked down on the front foot
crashed over the ring to deep cover, and India have avoided equalling the lowest score in a Twenty20 international
He's gone this time, stepping back, exposing his stumps, and trying to crack a back-foot cut off one which nipped in, Gilchrist taking the edge
